title: Pumpkin and maple syrup pie
ingredients: ['1 small sugar pumpkin', '165g dark brown soft sugar', '1 1/4 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/8 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '160ml pure maple syrup', '300ml single cream', '1 teaspoon plain flour', '3 eggs', '1 (23cm) unbaked shortcrust pastry case']
